duties_responsibilities.duty: Setting up contracts in PeopleSoft and creating revenue and billing plans based on the contract terms.
Amending PeopleSoft contracts to accommodate work scope changes and addressing queries related to setup with the Billing Team.
Performing accruals, journal entries, and handling ad-hoc queries as assigned by management.
Demonstrating proactive problem-solving, teamwork, communication, organizational, and customer service skills.
Comfort working in a fast-paced environment, meeting deadlines, and maintaining accuracy in data entry.

education_certification.credential: BBA/BS Degree in Business, Finance, or Accounting
